Title: Enacts the anti-waiver of employment rights act
Summary: Enacts the "anti-waiver of employment rights act" to invalidate any express or implied contractual provision waiving or otherwise limiting any employee's substantive or procedural rights, remedies, or claim.
LawCode: Add ยง219-e, Lab L; add ยง302, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law and the executive law, in relation to enacting the "anti-waiver of employment rights act"
